name: MATCH
description: Specify the patterns to search for in the database.

name: OPTIONAL MATCH
description: Specify the patterns to search for in the database while using `nulls` for missing parts of the pattern.

name: LIMIT
description: A sub-clause used to constrain the number of rows in the output.

name: WITH
description: Allows query parts to be chained together, piping the results from one to be used as starting points or criteria in the next.

name: RETURN
description: Defines what to include in the query result set.

name: DELETE
description: Delete nodes, relationships or paths. Any node to be deleted must also have all associated relationships explicitly deleted.

name: DETACH DELETE
description: Delete a node or set of nodes. All associated relationships will automatically be deleted.

name: FOREACH
description: Update data within a list, whether components of a path, or the result of aggregation.

name: CREATE
description: Create nodes and relationships.

name: MERGE
description: Ensures that a pattern exists in the graph. Either the pattern already exists, or it needs to be created.

name: ON CREATE
description: Used in conjunction with `MERGE`, specifying the actions to take if the pattern needs to be created.

name: ON MATCH
description: Used in conjunction with `MERGE`, specifying the actions to take if the pattern already exists.

name: ORDER BY
description: A sub-clause following `RETURN` or `WITH`, specifying that the output should be sorted in either ascending (the default) or descending order.

name: SET
description: Update labels on nodes and properties on nodes and relationships.

name: WHERE
description: A sub-clause used to add constraints to the patterns in a `MATCH` or `OPTIONAL MATCH` clause, or to filter the results of a `WITH` clause.

name: EXISTS
description: An existential sub-query used to filter the results of a `MATCH`, `OPTIONAL MATCH` or `WITH` clause.

name: AND
description: Conjuction.

name: CONTAINS
description: Case-sensitive inclusion search.

name: DISTINCT
description: Duplicate removal.

name: ENDS WITH
description: Case-sensitive suffix search.

name: IN
description: List element existence check.

name: IS NOT NULL
description: Non-`null` check.

name: IS NULL
description: `null` check.

name: NOT
description: Negation.

name: OR
description: Disjunction.

name: STARTS WITH
description: Case-sensitive prefix search.

name: XOR
description: Exclusive disjunction.

name: AS
description: Alias.

name: ASC
description: Ascending order.

name: DESC
description: Descending order.

name: CASE
description: A generic conditional expression, similar to if/else statements available in other languages.

name: LOAD CSV
description: Use when importing data from CSV files.

name: REMOVE
description: Remove properties and labels from nodes and relationships.

name: SHOW
description: List constraints or indexes in the database, either all or filtered on type/B-tree only.

name: SKIP
description: A sub-clause defining from which row to start including the rows in the output.

name: UNION
description: Combines the result of multiple queries. Duplicates are removed.

name: UNION ALL
description: Combines the result of multiple queries. Duplicates are retained.

name: UNWIND
description: Expands a list into a sequence of rows.
